stana 0.99.0

    stana

    plotCirclize

    plotCirclize.Rd

    Using `circlize` package, make a circular visualization of the relationship between genes and corresponding SNVs in genes.

    Usage

    plotCirclize(
  stana,
  candSp,
  genomeId,
  include_gene = NULL,
  thresh_snp_gene = 5,
  featList = list(),
  cols = c("tomato", "steelblue", "gold", "seagreen"),
  controlColor = "steelblue",
  MAF = FALSE,
  cl = NULL,
  featCircos = list(),
  showGeneName = TRUE,
  returnRawDf = FALSE,
  featThresh = 0,
  cex = 0.3,
  textCex = 0.5,
  bar_width = 10,
  contPalette = c("steelblue", "tomato"),
  discPalette = "Dark2"
)

    Arguments

    stana

    stana object

    candSp

    candidate species ID

    genomeId

    genome ID to plot

    thresh_snp_gene

    include only genes with at least this number of SNVs

    featList

    features to plot

    cols

    color of each feature

    controlColor

    control (not reaching `featThresh`) color in points and barplot

    MAF

    plot MAF for each group

    cl

    cluster information (named list)

    featCircos

    which type of circos to use in the corresponding feature

    showGeneName

    show gene ID on the plot

    returnRawDf

    return the raw data frame used in the plot

    featThresh

    for numeric features, the values above this value will be colored , default to zero.

    cex

    point size

    textCex

    text size

    bar_width

    on circos.barplot

    contPalette

    palette for continuous scale

    discPalette

    palette for discrete scale

    Value

    draw circlize plot

    On this page
